name: places/ChIJDwPtg1BZwokRYWF1dbWDukk
formattedAddress: 55 W 25th St, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 55 W 25th St, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Dishonest staff. I showed them I booked a parking spot via an app. They looked at it carefully and said I should wait 10 minutes till a slot is available. I parked, went on my way, only to discovered when I was back in the parking lot that I booked the parking in the place next door and was now asked to pay for the parking at iCon bc my reservation was not with them. I would never park there ever again. Horrible customer service, stay away from this place.

originalText.text: Always have some sort of stain on my car after parking here. It's the closet to my job that has an electric charger so I am kinda stuck. Also for some reason I get charged 46 dollars for charging and parking when I decide to charge and they don't charge to 100 percent. This is the reason I charge there. It's slow but I get a charge to where I want it.

originalText.text: Purchased 48 hours of reserved parking (Sat 2pm to Mon 2pm) before leaving Michigan for a short stay in New York.  We were dropping our daughter doing an internship this summer.  Icon was recommended by our hotel since they have no parking of their own.  The car was full of her stuff to be taken to her apartment the day after our arrival.  But found out upon arrival there were no in/out privileges.  So on move in day, once we left for a few hours to drop off her stuff our entire pre-payment was applied to out first night's parking with no refund for the left over time (lost about $60 of value).  Plus they charged me for having an oversized SUV (Dodge Durango) and wouldn't apply the lost value to that charge.  I was referred to customer service via phone which is only open Mon-Friday (not any help on the weekend).  I hadn't seen any disclaimer about in/out on their website although we did find it in the fine print on my receipt (so a bit late).  Naturally parked else where the 2nd night and found the iPark staff more accommodating.

originalText.text: Avoid this parking and ICON parking in  general. We always use Spot Hero to book and prepay parking and we noticed that each time we book an ICON parking we have issues. They don’t recognize your spot Hero booking and make issues. We had that again today. Decision made: last time we book an ICON parking. Avoid like the plague.

originalText.text: This is a fraud place that confirmed the price upon entry but charged double the price at exit. The staff yelled, shouted and pointed at customers. Horrible please and nasty human being. Avoid!
